pkgmetadata.longdescription: ================== Python-Multipart==================.. image:: https://github.com/andrew-d/python-multipart/actions/workflows/test.yaml/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/andrew-d/python-multipart/actionspython-multipart is an Apache2 licensed streaming multipart parser for Python.Test coverage is currently 100%.Documentation is available `here`_... _here: https://andrew-d.github.io/python-multipart/Why?----Because streaming uploads are awesome for large files.How to Test-----------If you want to test:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install .[dev] $ inv test
